name: Deutsche Bank AG
description:
Deutsche Bank AG is a German multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in Frankfurt, Germany. The bank is operational in 58 countries with a large presence in Europe, the Americas and Asia. As of 2021-2022, Deutsche Bank was the 21st largest bank in the world by total assets. The company is a component of the DAX stock market index.

Deutsche Bank offers financial services for corporations, governments, institutional investors, small and medium-sized businesses, and private individuals, including private, business and investment banking, along with a range of investment services. Deutsche Bank's stated mission is to enable economic growth and societal progress by creating positive impact for its clients, people, investors, and communities.

sector.name: Financials
sector.description: Companies involved in financial services to commercial and retail customers, including banks, investment funds, insurance companies and real estate.
